scripts.tauri:build: npm run prepare:resources && tauri build --bundles app dmg && node scripts/postbuild-copy-backend.mjs
scripts.tauri:install: APP_SRC="$PWD/src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/p-brain.app" && rm -rf "/Applications/p-brain.app" 2>/dev/null || true && ditto "$APP_SRC" "/Applications/p-brain.app" && xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine "/Applications/p-brain.app" || true && echo "Installed to /Applications/p-brain.app"
